definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: An edible wild herbs production processing base is proposed to be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 拟建山野菜生产加工基地，产品销往国内外。

sentences.english: An edible factory with annual production of 2000 tons is planned to be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 拟建山野菜速冻保鲜厂一座，年加工能力2000吨。

sentences.english: Besides, their nutrition components are rich, and can be exploited as a health potherb resource.
sentences.chinese: 同时营养成分丰富，可作为保健野菜开发利用。

sentences.english: The investigation of wild vegetables includes their resources investigation and social utilization investigation.
sentences.chinese: 山野菜调查包括其资源调查和社会利用调查。

sentences.english: The content of these elements in these wild potherbs is obviously higher than routine vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 这些野菜的营养元素含量明显高于常规蔬菜。

sentences.english: Green vegetables, pollution-free, the Northern unique Potherb.
sentences.chinese: 绿色蔬菜，无污染，北方特有的山野菜。

sentences.english: We have local wild vegetables from Wuzhi Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我们店里有正宗的五指山野菜。

sentences.english: Pick them for dinner perfectly well.
They dig for vegetables with sharpened sticks and eat their food off banana leaves.
sentences.chinese: 他们用削尖的棍子挖掘野菜，用香蕉叶盛他们的食物。

sentences.english: KOTORI :It's my turn to make dinner, right? I'll make your favorite, steamed rice with edible wild plants.
sentences.chinese: 轮到我做晚饭了，对吗？我做你最喜欢的，野菜蒸饭。

sentences.english: She dug wild vegetables and picked over cinders to help out.
sentences.chinese: 她挖野菜，捡煤核，来帮助家里。

sentences.english: There are various kinds and very rich resources of edible wild her bs in our vast re-gion.
sentences.chinese: 我国地域辽阔，野菜种类繁多，野菜资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: There are various kinds and very rich resources of edible wild her bs in our vast re-gion.
sentences.chinese: 我国地域辽阔，野菜种类繁多，野菜资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: The invention provides the paper type mountain potherb and the processing method, which belongs to the field of food processing.
sentences.chinese: 纸型山野菜及其加工方法，属于食品加工领域。

sentences.english: Create a wild feast from all that is edible and growing wild in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 搞一个野菜盛宴，尝尝英国野外生长的食用植物。

sentences.english: The guerrillas camped in the open and lived on wild plants.
sentences.chinese: 游击队员在野地露宿，靠吃野菜生活。

definition: game/wild animals and birds hunted for food or sport
Chinese toon (Toona sinensis), deciduous tree whose young leaves are used as a vegetable
fat hen (Chenopodium album), edible annual plant
matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
